lyrics.stanza: O now I see the cleansing wave! The fountain deep and wide; Jesus, my Lord, mighty to save, Points to His wounded side.
The cleansing stream I see, I see; I plunge, and O it cleanseth me! O praise the Lord it cleanseth me! It cleanseth me, yes, cleanseth me.
I see the dear Redeemer raised, I hear the speaking blood; It speaks! My spirit is amazed! And quickened by its flood.
I rise to walk in God's own light Above the world and sin, With heart renewed and garments white And Christ enthroned within.
